page.title: 09ARMED ROBBERY
page.content: Not much happens in Aveley but in the past 6 months there has been a few excitments. In Aveley there was an armed robbery in Kenningtons.2 men dressed as police with shot guns broke into a house and ransacked it.They tied and gagged the man and woman and said that they would shoot them if they moved ! On Wednesday the 10th of July 2 people were reported missing.Mr and Mrs Smart of Hanford road Avely , went missing at about midnight.They left in their green Ford van.Police and Army drivers were searching the bottom of the river Thames, looking for them.I thnk that they were found drowned in their car on the bottom of the Thames.
